title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Abby share some recent personal life moments. They discuss their favorite animals, and answer some dark questions. Morgan talks about Adult Gymnastics, what she’s watching now and shares some Food Worlds. Abby talks about the upcoming concert she’s excited for and the half marathon she’s running!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
